definition: to whistle past/to hurtle past/to zip by
to call/to cry/to shout/to breath out/to exhale
variant of 呼[hu1]/to shout/to call out
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-

sentences.english: The bullet zipped past my shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 子弹从我的肩头呼啸而过。

sentences.english: Just then, a whole flight of bombers zoomed over the house.
sentences.chinese: 就在这时，一整队轰炸机从房子上空呼啸而过。

sentences.english: They eat crouched in corners or on the street as cars whiz by.
sentences.chinese: 他们蹲在角落里或在轿车呼啸而过大街上吃饭。

sentences.english: A muscle car roared down the highway.
sentences.chinese: 一辆肌肉车在高速公路上呼啸而过。

sentences.english: Two guys were riding down the street in a car. They come to a red light.
sentences.chinese: 两个男人开车前行，路遇一红灯，司机呼啸而过。

sentences.english: The wind screamed over the Gulf and turned the water white.
sentences.chinese: 大风在海湾上空呼啸而过，把海水吹得白浪翻滚。

sentences.english: Shrapnel zings by, slices my throat.
sentences.chinese: 弹片呼啸而过，把我的喉咙割破。

sentences.english: The author was constantly aware of cars and trucks on the road.
sentences.chinese: 笔者在路上经常会遭遇呼啸而过的大卡车。

sentences.english: Some speedboats can zip around at 80 miles an hour.
sentences.chinese: 有一些快艇可以以每小时80英里的时速呼啸而过。

sentences.english: The trees bent as the north wind howled through them.
sentences.chinese: 北风呼啸而过，树都弯了。

sentences.english: The train thundered by, shaking the house.
sentences.chinese: 列车呼啸而过，房子都震动起来。

definition: to sweep past/to hurtle past/to swoosh past
to flit across/to sweep past/to glance (strike at an angle)
(of a meteor etc) to streak across (the sky)/(of a searchlight, lightning etc) to play across (the sky)
to crush sth by running over it
to go through/to bore through/to push one's way through
